verses.verse: "Then we <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> up the <S%H1870>road<s%> to <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and <S%H5747>Og,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out to <S%H7122>meet<s%> us in <S%H4421>battle<s%> at <S%H154>Edrei.<s%>

"But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, 'Do not <S%H3372>fear<s%> him, for I have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> and his <S%H776>land<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to him <S%H9201>just<s%> as you <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> at <S%H2809>Heshbon.<s%>'

"So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> into our <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and we <S%H5221>smote<s%> them <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H8300>survivor<s%> was <S%H7604>left.<s%>

"And we <S%H3920>captured<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5892>cities<s%> at that <S%H6256>time;<s%> there was not a <S%H7151>city<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we did not <S%H3947>take<s%> from them: <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9112>region<s%> of <S%H709>Argob,<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

<S%H3605>"All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H1219>fortified<s%> with <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2346>walls,<s%> <S%H1817>gates<s%> and <S%H1280>bars,<s%> <S%H905>besides<s%> <S%H4480><s%> a <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H6521>unwalled<s%> <S%H5892>towns.<s%>

"And we <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them, as we <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroying<s%> the <S%H4962>men,<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> and <S%H2945>children<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%>
"But <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H929>animals<s%> and the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> we <S%H962>took<s%> as our <S%H962>booty.<s%>

"Thus we <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> from the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%>
<S%H6722>(Sidonians<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%> <S%H8303>Sirion,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> it <S%H8149>Senir<s%>):

<S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4334>tableland<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H5548>Salecah<s%> and <S%H154>Edrei,<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

(For <S%H7534>only<s%> <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> was <S%H7604>left<s%> of the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> his <S%H6210>bedstead<s%> was an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H6210>bedstead;<s%> it is in <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%> Its <S%H753>length<s%> was <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> and its <S%H7341>width<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> by <S%H376>ordinary<s%> <S%H520>cubit.<s%>)

"So we <S%H3423>took<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> at that <S%H6256>time.<s%> From <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is by the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and its <S%H5892>cities,<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> and to the <S%H1425>Gadites.<s%>

"And the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og,<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9112>region<s%> of <S%H709>Argob<s%> (concerning <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> it is <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>

<S%H2971>Jair<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9112>region<s%> of <S%H709>Argob<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1651>Geshurites<s%> and the <S%H4602>Maacathites,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> it, [that is], <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> his own <S%H8034>name,<s%> Havvoth-jair, [as it is] to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>)
"And to <S%H4353>Machir<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

"And to the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> and to the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> from <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> even as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> as a <S%H1366>border<s%> and as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H2999>Jabbok,<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon;<s%>

the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> also, with the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> as [a] <S%H1366>border,<s%> from <S%H3672>Chinnereth<s%> even as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6160>Arabah,<s%> the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> at the <S%H8478>foot<s%> of the <S%H794>slopes<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah<s%> on the <S%H4217>east.<s%>

"Then I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it; <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1121>men<s%> shall <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H9139>armed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

'But your <S%H802>wives<s%> and your <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones<s%> and your <S%H4735>livestock<s%> (I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you have <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H4735>livestock<s%>), shall <S%H3427>remain<s%> in your <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you,

<S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5117>gives<s%> <S%H5117>rest<s%> to your <S%H251>fellow<s%> <S%H251>countrymen<s%> as to you, and they <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%> Then you may <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H3425>possession,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you.'

"And I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings;<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> into <S%H834>which<s%> you are about to <S%H5674>cross.<s%>
'Do not <S%H3372>fear<s%> them, for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is the one <S%H3898>fighting<s%> for you.'
"I also <S%H2603>pleaded<s%> with the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

'O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> Thou hast <S%H2490>begun<s%> to <S%H7200>show<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> Thy <S%H1433>greatness<s%> and Thy <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand;<s%> for <S%H4310>what<s%> <S%H410>god<s%> is there in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> or on <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> can <S%H6213>do<s%> such <S%H4639>works<s%> and <S%H1369>mighty<s%> <S%H1369>acts<s%> as Thine?

'Let me, I <S%H4994>pray,<s%> <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2896>fair<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> that is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> that <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> and <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>'

"But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H9378>angry<s%> with me on your <S%H4616>account,<s%> and would not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me; and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H7227>'Enough!<s%> <S%H1696>Speak<s%> to Me <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5750><s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>matter.<s%>

<S%H5927>'Go<s%> up to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah<s%> and <S%H5375>lift<s%> up your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> and <S%H6828>north<s%> and <S%H8486>south<s%> and <S%H4217>east,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> [it] with your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> for you shall not <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

'But <S%H6680>charge<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H2388>encourage<s%> him and <S%H553>strengthen<s%> him; for he shall <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>across<s%> at the <S%H6440>head<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and he shall <S%H5159>give<s%> them as an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you will <S%H7200>see.<s%>'
"So we <S%H3427>remained<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> <S%H4136>opposite<s%> Beth-peor.
